meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unceremonious.
meanings.sent1: Her unceremoniousnesses surprised everyone at the formal event.
meanings.sent2: The unceremoniousnesses of his speech offended the guests.
meanings.sent3: The unceremoniousnesses of the cat knocking over the vase made us all laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unceremoniousnesses of the storm's arrival caught us off guard.
meanings.sent5: The unceremoniousnesses of the teacher's dismissal left the students in shock.

meanings.definition: Lack of formality or politeness in behavior or speech.
meanings.sent1: The unceremoniousnesses of his greeting made her feel unwelcome.
meanings.sent2: She was taken aback by the unceremoniousnesses of his farewell.
meanings.sent3: The unceremoniousnesses of the dog stealing the sandwich was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unceremoniousnesses of the news hit him like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The unceremoniousnesses of the email reply was both surprising and rude.
